coreAttributes.name: Cotton Candy Soda
coreAttributes.description: A large translucent plastic cup of blue raspberry cotton candy flavoured soda. The label depicts a raccoon-boy in a lab coat dangling a wad of cotton candy over a bowl of carbonated water.

[##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/10)]

A cool wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 1)]
